TITLE: Copy Comments - FastComments
HEADING: Copy Comments
DESCRIPTION_PART1: This tool allows you to batch copy your comments that are already uploaded to the FastComments platform, from one page to another. If you're looking to copy your comments from your site, you want the import tool.
DESCRIPTION_PART2: This tool works with full URLs, or a URL ID.
URL_ID_FROM_PLACEHOLDER: A URL or an Article/Post ID
URL_ID_TO_PLACEHOLDER: A URL or an Article/Post ID
URL_TO_HELP: Since the URL ID may be an ID and not a URL, enter the destination URL here even if it is the same value.
EMAIL_NOTIFICATION: You'll receive an email with a download link when complete. You can view the status of jobs below.
REFRESH_FOR_STATUS: Refresh the page to get the latest status.
NO_JOBS: You don't have any pending or past jobs.
